Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Southbound Reroute near Wentworth/28th
ShortDescription: SB 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth, 26th, State, 31st, & Wentworth, due to street blockage near Wentworth/28th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth, 26th, State, 31st, & Wentworth, due to street blockage near Wentworth/28th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Garfield.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
